website_summaries.verdict: The faux fur style makes this throw a standout choice for a decorative throw.
pros: If you want something more decorative, go with this Chanasya throw
Customers love it for its extreme softness
cons: Some customers noted discolorations in their blankets

customer_reviews.title: It’s not faux fur
customer_reviews.text: I’d give it zero stars, it doesn’t look anything like faux fur, it’s just a fleece blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable but two sides are different, beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this blanket, looks very expensive and elegant on one side. However on the backside is a completely different material that looks very cheap. It is super soft though and my kids love it. Wish that both sides were the same material. I bought the black one and the gray one to compare, and ended up keeping the gray one as the contrast of the backside was less severe and look nicer to me than the backside of the black one. Overall very soft and comfy. Please click the helpful button if anything in this review helped you.
customer_reviews.author: meg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect faux fur blanket
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a thick, soft, and plush blanket and this worked perfectly. The faux fur isn't as soft as real fur but is still extremely soft, and the inner lining feels amazing. I was worried to order it due to some reviews stating that they found stains, but my order was stain-free and clean. The color is just as pictured, a nice fade of grey tones. It has not shed at all nor does it have any loose threads, and this blanket has already been through some rough kneading from my cats. Will probably order another one of these in a different color in the future because it's well fought-over.
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: Great soft blanket (or fur cloak for costume)!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I purchased this for kinda a non-blanket use.... I got it as a last minute costume addition for my husband to use as a fur cloak to be a character from Game of Thrones -- well it totally worked! His costume was a total hit - this really looked like a fur cloak. It also is super freaking soft and is now a great throw blanket - my cats are actually borderline obsessed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Super fuzzy soft blanket!
customer_reviews.text: Much softer and fuzzier than I expected. I bought this for my Hyggekrog (my cozy nook) where I curl up with a cup of herbal tea and read. It's super plush and lux for a throw. Feels like real chinchilla. The underside is a soft fleece that feels like spun air it's so soft and light. My cats love it too (see photo). Definitely buying another for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Demcak

customer_reviews.title: I don't particularly like to write reviews for things but I will in ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't particularly like to write reviews for things but I will in this case. I love this throw, which is accurately described as "super soft fuzzy". And for the price? You can't beat it. Seriously, give it a go. I got mine in charcoal and it's nice looking, too. I live in a temperate climate but it does get chilly at night and this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Lollygagging

customer_reviews.title: Dont get your hopes up!falling apart,,seams are really loose,,cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Made in china,,,not as heavy and thick as a 2 ply fake fur and sherpa,,,,,I bought this on a lighting deal .It is soft but would not use this as a comforter or blanket..not thick ,,just a throw...do not expect more,,,,Its made ok but a few threads here and there.....keep an eye out There are better ones out thereI would never pay full price for this if I was able to feel and see it first...Amazon shoppers look for more quality ....not what I expected!!UPDATE:This thing is really falling apart...the stitching between the sherpa and fur is coming loose ,,so I have holes all ready starting!!The one I was sent as a replacement was like a shag pink carpet!!
customer_reviews.author: Luke Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Advertisement: MADE IN CHINA
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this company. They describe themselves as a "family owned company based in Austin, TX" and describe their product as "Based in Austin, TX". I thought I was actually buying a product locally made in Texas. I get the package and its MADE IN CHINA. Nowhere in the product description or details does it state "made in China". I would not have purchased if I realized it was from China rather than locally.
customer_reviews.author: Bengi

customer_reviews.title: As soft and comfortable as claimed & perfect for reading or movie watching
customer_reviews.text: As soft and comfortable as claimed & perfect for reading or movie watching. I've gotten many compliments on it. The only problem is that I have to get one or both of my cats off it!
customer_reviews.author: Sgw

customer_reviews.title: Extremely soft
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute softest throw blanket I have ever owned. I love it! It’s the perfect size. I have experienced no shedding of the blanket. It’s extremely warm. The only issue is that my dog seems to like it even more than me
customer_reviews.author: Buzz

customer_reviews.title: Favorite blankie in the world
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a long time ago and I'm writing this review as of more than 6 months later. I still use it on a nightly basis currently and seen no problems with it. It is super soft and comfy! Best blanket in the world. My cat also loves it and he likes to sleep on it beside me.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Soft for awhile
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this blanket when I first bought it. Super soft, comfy and was what I was looking for. After two years worth of washings, it's age has begun to show. I bought a Star Wars blanket around the same time. It's made of the same fleece as the grey blanket, and the Star Wars blanket has survived must better. Must be a better quality fleece.
customer_reviews.author: Writerx

customer_reviews.title: Buy now!!!! Don't miss out on the joy I receive when I am tucked in....
customer_reviews.text: This throw blanket will definitely keep you warm, but not sweaty hot. It is soft and PLUSH, PLUSH, PLUSH. I URGE YOU TO BIY NOW. EVERY COLOR AND THE 60× WHATEVER THROW SIZE OR THE QUEEN OR KING SIZE. The larger throw size is large enough to cover my frame. I am 5'2 and weigh 130. I also have the queen size and it is hella LARGE! I LOVE IT! The queen size is large enough to cover up me, my 5 years old son, and my boyfriend and he is 5'6 and weigh 400 pounds. It is a must buy. I'm completely in love!
customer_reviews.author: Karen L.

customer_reviews.title: disintegrating blanket!
customer_reviews.text: the blanket began shedding copious amounts of fuzz immediately upon removing it from the packaging, it continued to shed so much fuzz that you look like a wooly mammoth after using the throw. Anything you place the blanket on or near has the same problem... it starts looking the the blanket's evil fuzzy twin. I attempted to fluff on air in the dryer after attempting to shake the extra fuzz off outside. My dryer was coated with a thick film of fuzz. This is a terrible product that no-one should buy.
customer_reviews.author: jeni p

customer_reviews.title: Not as nice after washing
customer_reviews.text: It's a great looking blanket, at first it was incredibly soft on the fur side but after the second wash (followed the directions stated on the product details) the faux fur feels sticky when I run my hand along it, since then when I have to wash it I've tried running it through a rinse cycle after using a small amount of soap and then drying it outside and it didnt help at all. Guess that's just how synthetic materials work.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle mae

customer_reviews.title: Bully Wife
customer_reviews.text: My wife rates this as a 5 star and I rated as a 1star. But it may just be because I am bitter that she will not share. She just sits on the couch wrapped in this thing with a smile on her face but smacked my hand when I go to grab the blanket. So I just sit in my corner shaking in the cold rocking back-and-forth like a crazy person
customer_reviews.author: Deuce728

customer_reviews.title: so nice for snuggling
customer_reviews.text: Updating my review. It was lovely when I first got it. I read all the reviews before purchasing and one selling point for me was that someone said it held up well after washing. I have two dogs and knew it would need frequent washing becasue they love laying on my blankets. After a few months of regular washes it looks nothing like it did. It's still soft, but instead of "furry" it now looks more "wooly" and has a different texture. It's not terrible, but it's not really what I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: LelaKay

customer_reviews.title: I've purchased these twice over the course of two years
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blanket two years ago and loved it. Forgot about it and purchased the SAME blanket again (pictured in the basket that I ALSO got from Amazon) and remembered immediately. It's so soft. The only complaint is that they are not very long. It's too short for my bf and we got the longest/largest size. I'm 5'3 and it's perfect (maybe even a little long). My bf is 5'10.
customer_reviews.author: katrinaforeal

customer_reviews.title: Fluffy
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and fluffy. the pattern is a bit different than what I was expecting and it definitely doesn't have a super "high quality" look, but over I'm happy with it and think its an excellent buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cierra

customer_reviews.title: It's Soft, but...
customer_reviews.text: A lot of the main uses for this blanket I see in the review photos are being utilized as pet blankets, and that is all I could really see this being used for. It is soft, I'll give it that, but it had a lot of loose threading hanging off portions of the blanket and I overall just was not very happy with the quality and feel of it, so I returned it without a replacement. For all of those who are wondering where it's made, it is made in China, and it certainly reflects.
customer_reviews.author: angela otis

customer_reviews.title: All these good reviews, you cant go wrong
customer_reviews.text: How many great rates does this Have? I bought this for my husband for Christmas as I bought my daughter a soft blanket from Target which my husband fell in love with and claimed for himself. After reading all the thousands of good rates on this, I thought I wouldn't go wrong. And I didn't. Very soft and not so thick that you sweat like crazy when you wrap yourself up in it. I cannot comment about the cleaning of it as I have not had to clean it yet. I am scared to do so as I am afraid that it will loose it's softness.
customer_reviews.author: A. McKee

customer_reviews.title: Material just falls out
customer_reviews.text: Super bummed out about this purchase and unfortunately I boxed it up for return and forgot to drop it off and now it’s too late to get a refund. The material falls out and is easy to pull out. It will stick to my clothes. It’s soft but it’s frustrating to remove the blanket and find a million little furrs sticking to you.
customer_reviews.author: boy mom

customer_reviews.title: Soft little blanket
customer_reviews.text: A gift to our grand daughter and another one for her little brother. We also bought the pillow covers. They love them and like to snuggle with them. I would love one myself and would recommend them for any age. It's nice that Amazon has different sizes to suit your need. I would definitely recommend. Vera Marolt
customer_reviews.author: VERA MAROLT

customer_reviews.title: If you are over fleece and want a pretty (and pet approved!) buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of my favorite practical Christmas gifts last year. I cuddle with this everyday in the evenings, many times my husband or dog join me! I researched A LOT for a soft blanket that provided the right amount of warmth. This was it! Fleece is not warm.. we have a lot of fleece blankets and they do not warm cold toes! I never get overheated with this blanket, but there are other fabrics I do so you don’t just think I’m cold natured. Honestly even when I’m not cold, the softness is soothing after stressful days/weeks! We should buy more to weed out the unused fleece blankets.
customer_reviews.author: Dan or Laura Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Warm and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in the throw size for my chair in the living room. I love it. It's a nice size, warm, furry, lightweight. Granted, I haven't yet washed it, so I don't know how well it will hold up to laundering. So far, though, it seems to be good value for money. I plan to buy another for my bed if this throw holds up well to washing.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnnReads

customer_reviews.title: Fluffy part comes out is you (lightly) pull on it!
customer_reviews.text: The blenket was REALLY soft! But I noticed that you CAN PULL OUT THE COTTON PART! I like to brush out my blankets when the cotton starts to clump up so I can preserve the softness, but I was (lightly) pulling on the fur and it came out easily!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these Jan 9 and really loved them but both have since come apart at the switching. They both have really huge holes and are coming apart in less than 2 months. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: kellistephens

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS THROW. It is sooo soft and comfortable, and it looks way more expensive than it was. I only wish I had bought the bigger size! I got it in gray, which is a lovely neutral and goes perfectly with my living room. One side is the soft fur-looking side and the other is the soft fleece-y looking side. Both sides are warm and insanely soft. I like that the color isn't flat, it's varied with different shades and I feel like that makes it look much more posh.
customer_reviews.author: Raechelle

customer_reviews.title: Sweet and Sour
customer_reviews.text: I’ll be honest here: This was a gift for a sweet girl I was dating before we spoiled and turned sour. I had. Barry White album, a super nice candle and this blanket ready for her for Christmas, while I went home to the two weeks. The goal was that she could cuddle up, light the candle, play some smooth Barry, and enjoy our time apart. Well....our time apart was permanent and when this arrived at my apt, she asked if it was still hers.,.selfish selfish lol. So I kept it...and let me tell you, thank goodness we broke up bc this blanket kicks. Buy buy buy!
customer_reviews.author: Chris McGinty

customer_reviews.title: MADE IN CHINA
customer_reviews.text: It literally looks nothing like the photo that looks fur like. It looks like every over blanket you buy that is made in China. Sending back.
customer_reviews.author: kellye

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with this blanket. It feels just like any other blanket you can get for way cheaper. I just got this to put over our couch for our dogs and it is very plain...not as luxurious as the pictures. I wanted to return it but they charge almost $10 for return shipping so I’ll just be keeping it. Overall I don’t reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Holland

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for Blanket Lovers
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my step-mother for Christmas as she's a blanket person, and she absolutely loved it. Its warm, thick enough to retain your heat, and extremely soft. Not sure how it will hold up to washing as she just opened it for Chrismas, but all in all it is a great gift for those who get cold real easily or just love blankets.
customer_reviews.author: Chad L McGlothlin

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and not luxurious.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes but tbh this blanket just isn’t luxurious. Feels cheap. I got an extremely soft blanket form Ross for 15$ that’s way nicer. Super let down. Not worth more then 10-15$
customer_reviews.author: samantha nelson

customer_reviews.title: Best Blanket Ever
customer_reviews.text: This blanket has changed my life. Ok that’s dramatic but if you love snuggling up in a good fluffy blanket- this is the one. I got it for my couch, just something the family could snuggle up with when watching a movie or whatever. My husband loves it, my son loves it, my dog loves it, and my cat loves it!!! It’s been such a massive hit and adds a stylish touch the living room. I’m actually planning on buying a teal one for my bedroom because I can’t get enough of it. So fluffy, so soft, so good. Highly recommend, you won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Dietschweiler

customer_reviews.title: I would rate this higher if I could
customer_reviews.text: Divine fluff and soft beyonce soft on both sides, my only regret is that I didn’t buy the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: M. B. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the quality
customer_reviews.text: It is very soft, but it does not look or feel very high quality. You can see bald patches along the seams, and it doesn’t seem like it will last many washes. Also, I was expecting the faux fur to be on both sides. The other side is a soft fleece material that looks like a blanket I’d give to my dog. I do not think this blanket is worth what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cozy. If you aren't sure...get it! I think you will be happy
customer_reviews.text: This is well worth the price. I've seen this quality cost way more. I got the gray and love the colors that run through it. A definite cuddle up throw when snuggling on sofa and a pretty accent throw to drape over sofa or accent chair. So far no static. I hate static!!! Only problem is my cats gonna want it and what diva wants diva gets. The reverse has a nice Sherpa fabric. Not some thin fleece pretending to be more. Great gift as well. I would be thrilled to get this as a gift. Impressed with quality and pleased with price.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly soft and fuzzy
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite blanket. This is the softest blanket I have ever had. I would definitely buy this again. The only drawback is that it does shed a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: So soft and great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a blanket for my dog and she absolutely loves it. It’s very soft and great quality for the price. I’m thinking of getting a bigger size as a throw for my couch. I haven’t washed it yet but it’s looks sturdy enough that I don’t think it’ll be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine C.

customer_reviews.title: LOOOOVE this throw!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most beautiful, soft, and plush throws I've ever owned. I loved the gray one so much, I went and bought another one in red. Not disappointed at all! I would buy again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: D. Schulz

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it and couldn't bring myself to put it away ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself as a "snuggle" blanket to keep on my bed for those times where you don't want to be tucked under the covers. I absolutely love it and couldn't bring myself to put it away even during the desert summers. I've bought a large number of similar blankets but this is the only one that still stayed so soft after the first wash. Even after 10 washes, the color still looks brand new and its as soft as ever. Just be sure to not stick this in the dryer. I heard that this really damages this blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Chichidango

customer_reviews.title: So freaking soft!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this blanket. I'm someone who loves being on the couch and having a blanket to wrap myself up in and cuddle. I've been using a comforter before and it was just too big and got in the way. And not to mention clashed with furmture. With this I can use it as a blanket and when I'm not I can throw on the couch for decoration. My dogs love it too, find them always laying on it or sleeping on it. I put a 4 star for durability and easy to wash because I have got that far yet. I've only had the blanket a few days. But again so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not soft after wash
customer_reviews.text: I loveedddddd this blanket when it first came. After the first wash though it isn’t nearly the same. I followed cleaning instructions and it’s definitely lost half of its softness factor.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Not as fur-like as we had hoped
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. It's not as fur-like as we had hoped. It doesn't work as the cuddly winter fur throw for the family couch because it does NOT insulate at all. Not one bit. If you buy this product, know that you buy it for the physical appearance only. It doesn't actually function well as a blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Owen from CT

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased great quality
customer_reviews.text: This feels like really soft animal fur.. normally when i see 5 star item at cheap price their always an issue. This is well made quality product and feels awesome.. very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jp

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter. Her boys love to snuggle up with a blanket when they watch TV. This throw works perfectly for that and looks great left out on the sectional as well.
customer_reviews.author: cindyo

customer_reviews.title: Soft and attractive, but sheds a lot
customer_reviews.text: The faux fur side of this blanket is really soft; unfortunately, it also sheds and leaves lots of very fine fibers on my clothes and floor. These fibers also bunch up into little balls, which love sticking to clothes. Overall I like this blanket - it's soft, and the fleece side traps a decent amount of warmth, and it looks nice. I don't know if I'll continue using it though: the fibers are very fine and may be contributing to a mild but persistent cough I've had lately as these fibers sometimes find themselves airborne.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Love this blanket!
customer_reviews.text: Love this blanket! So soft but it looses that after washing. Still soft but not like when it's new. It held up great in the washer and dryer. Perfect weight not light but not real heavy either.
customer_reviews.author: Obi Mom Kenobi

customer_reviews.title: So Soft
customer_reviews.text: One side of this blanket makes me want to cuddle up and be warm and snuggly and the other side is sooo soft and silky you want to wear just the blanket and lay there all day. Its wondeful, even after a few washes.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: I really recommend this blanket
customer_reviews.text: So soft and cozy!!! I really recommend this blanket. I just moved to New England and knew I would want something cozy for the winter evenings. It's a bit thinner than I expected (expected it to be a bit bulkier/heavier) but it's still soooo amazing. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Tegan George

customer_reviews.title: 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 THE SOFTEST BLANKET EVER!!! 😍
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, LOVE this throw blanket! I purchased the marbled gray and love it so much that I'm going to purchase the white in a larger size!! If you are looking for a very soft blanket/throw this is it!!! Buy it, you won't be disappointed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not the best.
customer_reviews.text: Both materials stretch, so if you pull on it the wrong way, you can easily rip out the stitching on 2 ends. It's nice, but it's not great quality. I might buy again. 🤔
customer_reviews.author: Travaro

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL, ELEGANT AND CLASSY!  SO SOFT!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! This blanket goes perfect with my espresso leather sofas and my charcoal gray, dark brown and beige area rug. Not only is it gorgeous, it's so soft and cozy. The perfect size, not too big and not too small. I just LOVE LOVE LOVE this blanket. Would be a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: cozy
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket. Its so cozy. I purchased the dark gray/black one the smallest size as a accent for my bed to make it feel more adult like. It works perfect. except my husband was upset I did not order a bigger size so he could wrap up in it. lol
customer_reviews.author: Wevin1

customer_reviews.title: Sheds!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color gray and super soft... but it sheds worse then a cat and dog. I literally have to vacuum. 2-3 times a day and my clothes are covered with fuzz from the blanket. Wanted to really love this blanket but the shedding is a headache.
customer_reviews.author: chetubig001

customer_reviews.title: Love Love LOVE
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable thing on earth. We loved this so much, we bought 3 smaller ones for my kids for Christmas. Would recommend to anyone and everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Completely worth every penny. I bought this to accent my new gray couch. I have a child. My dog, Charlie. It’s in her bed. She absolutely loves it. I’d buy another one for me! Great quality
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Adams

customer_reviews.title: SUPER soft, no shedding!
customer_reviews.text: My roommate kept turning off the heater like an absolute madlad all winter, so I bought this a few months ago to keep me warm. It's super soft, doesn't get damaged in the washing machine, and most importantly in my opinion, DOES NOT SHED. Shedding drives me absolutely insane, so this is my favorite part about the blanket. 10/10 would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously soft and great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: So so soft and super warm/cozy. It's absolutely beautiful. I've only washed it once but it held up perfectly fine, didn't change shape, pill, or shrink at all. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Groulx

customer_reviews.title: Love this blanket
customer_reviews.text: Love this blanket! Purchased it for a couch throw. Very soft and warm and my dog loves it! I am buying another one I like it so much. Works perfectly to take out to the fire pit when we sit around outside. Super comfy feel!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very soft
customer_reviews.text: Love how soft this is & size is big enough for me & my husband to share on the couch. Washes nice but after the 2nd wash it started to come apart & now is almost completely separated. Still like this blanket just thought it would hold together a lot longer but what can you expect for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Color variations aren't as vivid in the pics. :(
customer_reviews.text: This is a very soft and nicely made blanket. The only reason I'm giving it 3 stars is because the color variations aren't as great as the blanket in the pictures. It's barely 2 toned. I bought it because it looked like faux fur. It does not.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT SHEDS
customer_reviews.text: Product sheds like a MF'er, noticed when I sat on it with black jeans, figured ill wash it and they will go away, but nope did not, even sheded on my cloths in the washer and left my cloths with fur all over, was really hoping the product was true to the description.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully soft!
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is gorgeous, super soft and just the right size for my husband to throw over his side of the bed, the colour is true to the pictures. I've washed it using a delicate cycle and an air only dry cycle and it came out as good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Na fam
customer_reviews.text: Na fam, not worth $30. Ya’ll ever seen those ethnic tiger blankets? (will include meme for reference) Those are softer and cheaper. Still cute though so it’s fine I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle shahid

customer_reviews.title: Great for the cold person in your life
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what my wife was looking for. The material was so smooth and soft. It wasn’t too heavy, but a perfect weight for her. Once you slip under it, you instantly feel warm. Our daughter loves to steal it as a mat for nap time, and I’ve been known to procure it from my wife from time to time. Looks like we will be getting a bigger size soon!
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Emu

customer_reviews.text: it is exactly what you would expect from a blanket. it is very comfortable and will keep you warm when it is cold. my only complaint with the blanket is that if you are already warm and try to use it, then you will get hot. from what I understand this has something to do with physics and one of newton's laws, which they are currently lobbying to have repealed. over all 5/7, nice blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dog's crate. She loves soft plush blankets so she loves it. I was disappointed in the care instructions (cold water, gentle cycle, low dryer temperature). I can deal with this but just makes laundry a little inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Gail M.

customer_reviews.title: Crazy soft, warm, the family envy
customer_reviews.text: My son has a throw, my wife has hers, they both want mine. Both sides of this blanket are incredibly soft. I tend to share but not this. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: DeMalta

customer_reviews.title: Great blanket
customer_reviews.text: Great blanket, very soft and heavy feel to it. Very comparable to the one I bought from a high end store at the mall.
customer_reviews.author: Delania Bringle

customer_reviews.title: So I received my blanket 4 days ago. I've ...
customer_reviews.text: So I received my blanket 4 days ago. I've ordered 3 more since. Every living thing in my house is trying to claim it. Seriously people this blanket is the lover of all blankets. If your looking for a soft, yummy, warm thing to curl up with....this is your Lover. Stop reading the reviews and buy it all ready. 😁
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My homework paid off....
customer_reviews.text: I like it! I like it! And so does my husband. Twas a Christmas present for him.. so whew! Big thumbs up. I searched around for the right blanket. This is thicker than so many soft blankets that are out there, is soft and plush on both sides, and it looks great. Nice comfortable weight too. I would get it again. I like the darker color that I got.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Anne Oswald

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The faux fur is only on one side. The two faces aren’t sews together very well. The faux fur doesn’t really look as good as in the photo. Just looks like a mottled grey.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Dodd

customer_reviews.title: So soft and cozy!
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and authentic feeling. Love the soft and fuzzy fleece backing. I ordered to use in our guest room, but as soon as it arrived-my son saw it, felt it, loved it and took it to his room. I haven't seen it since!
customer_reviews.author: NitaB

customer_reviews.title: Cozy blanket
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my living room redecorating project. Arrived on time, in decent packaging. Feels very soft and cuddly; it's keeping me warm as I type! This blanket is a good size and very warm. The 'fur' is on one side with a shearling-type on the other side. The only downside is that it's a shedding a bit. Hopefully this will diminish as it gets more use. Other than that, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: LadyLauren

customer_reviews.title: my gf keeps stealing this from me
customer_reviews.text: keeps me warm wish i would have bought the bigger one plus my gf always takes it from me. the only thing i didnt like is that the fuzzy stuff on top kinda comes off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Eric H.

customer_reviews.title: It's a very nice throw. The "fur" appearance is a nice change ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice throw. The "fur" appearance is a nice change from other throws that are a plain and flat material. These blankets and throws with the faux fleece bring warmth without weight...very comfortable sleeping. Thanks...
customer_reviews.author: JAY

customer_reviews.title: Cant get enough of these
customer_reviews.text: I love these faux fur throw blankets! I've bought around 7 in a little over a year. Be really careful w how you wash them to help them last longer. I use these to help my cat not claw up my sofas so i have to have 2 for every couch and i just love them so much i want extras.
customer_reviews.author: Colorbyallie

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: This is the softest, most comfortable blanket I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: Jesterguy

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: My sons favorite throw. He absolutely loves this throw blanket! It’s super soft and warm. Will purchase more!
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Such a soft high quality throw!
customer_reviews.text: This throw is gorgeous, soft, fur on one side, fuzzy soft sherpa fabric on the other. My boyfriend and I cuddled under it on the couch last night. Almost want to buy a bigger one.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany L.

customer_reviews.title: so nice
customer_reviews.text: had to order a larger second one so the kids could snuggle with me. very light weight blanket.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Soft and luxurious
customer_reviews.text: The back is more sherpa-y but the top is AMAZING. It's so soft. I think I might order another one for our bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Laura E Chenault

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cozy sofa blanket
customer_reviews.text: I was kinda unimpressed when I opened this and saw how thin it was. But as soon as I used this, I realized how warm & cozy it is. Super duper soft and fluffy. Have not washed yet, so I’m not 100% sure about it’s durability, but overall Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious
customer_reviews.text: I love this throw. It’s so soft and thick. Very snuggly and warm! You won’t regret getting one. My husband even said how nice it is and it would be a good alternative to a comforter. I told him they make that size so now to talk him ordering also ha.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft
customer_reviews.text: It says it in the name. Super Soft. I love this blanket. Will buy more when possible, but so far I'm so content with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karianne

customer_reviews.title: Soft and warm
customer_reviews.text: Awesome blanket/throw. I love it. I love to nap under it and my dog fights me for it
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Garner

customer_reviews.title: Not the material shown
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting something softer. I thought the material/fabric shown was the same on both sides. The one underneath is only cotton. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Arredondo

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: I recently ordered the gray throw blanket, and I am so pleased with it! It is soft, lightweight, and comfortable. The only thing that made me a little disappointed was that it is a little more gray in color than a mix of the gray and white that it looks like in the photos. Still love it though! :)
customer_reviews.author: Autumn G.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but warm
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is gorgeous!! Warm & perfect just to accessorize your sofa or chair. Nice size as well
customer_reviews.author: AmazoToya R

customer_reviews.title: SUPER Soft & Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a future family member and she LOVES it! She always feels cold and now wraps herself up in this super soft blanket. I now want one for myself! It was delivered a day or two after Christmas, but I should’ve ordered it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Jana L. James

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and soooo cozy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for someone for Christmas and ended up buying another for myself! So warm and cozy and looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Avery

customer_reviews.title: Cozy
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter. She loves this blanket. So incredibly soft.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly soft and beautiful, but smaller than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful! It is a fairly heavy throw that is a bit smaller than I expected. I kept it without a second thought, because it is incredibly soft and beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: It's Soooo soft!!
customer_reviews.text: I gave to my son for Christmas and he loved it so I went over to take a look at it and I wanted it back!!! I loved it and it was so soft that even his girlfriend wanted it. Funny thing is... he had suggested it for her but I thought it was more manly and so I thought it a better gift for him. I should have gotten one for us all and will probably order it for me soon.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Dewitt

customer_reviews.title: SO soft!
customer_reviews.text: This throw is so soft and it is a nice size. Our college student loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Nmpollard

customer_reviews.title: Was gifted this item
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift and absolutely LOVED it. The perfect weight, super soft, and keeps you nice and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Webb

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft...on ONE SIDE
customer_reviews.text: Wow...even softer than it looks! The fake fur side is amazing and I haven't noticed any shedding yet. **BUT BEWARE** the opposite side is a little lumpy and NOT the soft faux fur (not important to me since I use it folded as a throw blanket, but would be a deal-breaker otherwise)
customer_reviews.author: Nati

customer_reviews.title: Very soft!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my lady for Christmas and she loves it. It’s very soft and comfortable. Great size!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color mix and even softer than expected!
customer_reviews.text: love love love this blanket! This mix coloring is exactly what I had been looking for as fabric to recover my pillows. I can't speak to what it's like to use as a blanket, but I made pillow cases out of it for my couch and they're so soft and look absolutely great!
customer_reviews.author: DM

product_meta.title: Chanasya Fuzzy Faux Fur Throw Blanket - Soft Light Weight Blanket for Bed Couch and Living Room Suitable for Fall Winter and Spring (50x65 Inches) Gray
feature_bullets: SUPER SOFT & COZY: Get cozy and warm with this extremely luxurious soft and fluffy plush blanket, perfect for snuggling up on the couch, bed, chilly movie theater, park or perfect personal gift for any occasion

CLASSY DECOR: Add extra texture to your decor and turns your room into an inviting space with this simple yet classy elegant design; drape it over a chair, couch or bed to add an exotic stylish touch to your living room or bed room, many available colors allow for easy mixing and matching with your decor or other accent pieces
BLANKET SIZE: 65x50 inches, suitable for couch, sofa and toddler bed; fabric content : 100% microfiber polyester
MACHINE WASH: Machine wash on gentle cycle with cold water,tumble dry at very low temperature, holds several machine wash and dry beautifully
DIVERSE USAGE: Couch throw, Bed Blanket, Outdoor Indoor Blanket, Travel , Gift Item, House décor, Holiday Birthday Housewarming Anniversary Gift Throw, Photo Prop and more

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,306 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Material Care Instructions: Machine wash gentle cycle with cold water, tumble dry at very low temperature. very durable hold up to several Machine washes and dries beautifully
